channel.title: CVE Feed for Noor-E-Alam -- Amazing Hover Effects
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Noor-E-Alam -- Amazing Hover Effects

item.title: CVE-2024-38741|2024-08-02T04:19:20.223Z -- noor-e-alam -- amazing%20hover%20effects
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Noor-E-Alam Amazing Hover Effects allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Amazing Hover Effects: from n/a through 2.4.9.
